turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I need you to order five pizzas from Pizza Hut.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Which Pizza Hut?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The one closest to my home.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, what sizes do you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: All five should be large.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: And what types of crust?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Three should be pan, two should be hand-tossed.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What toppings do you want on the first pan pizza?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Pepperoni, Salami, Ham, Sausage, and bacon.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: And the second one?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Black Olives, Bell Pepper, and Mushrooms.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: And the third?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Salami, Ham, Black Olives, Tomatoes, and Bell Pepper

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I got it. What do you want on the first hand tossed pizza?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Pepperoni, Black Olives, and Mushrooms.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What do you want on the second.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The second should be half and half.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What's on the first half?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Bell pepper, Tomatoes, and sausage.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What's on the second half?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Pepperoni, Chicken, Beef, and Pork.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, I got it. Do you want extra cheese on any of them?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, I just want normal amounts of cheese?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What about special crusts?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, I don't want anything special on the crust.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, I got that. Do you need any drinks or sides?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, I just need the pizzas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Is that everything, then?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Thank you, I'll place the order right away.
